bug.author: ZoranPandovski
bug.summary: Error when row contains missing values in MySQL
bug.description: Using <denchmark-link:https://www.kaggle.com/c/titanic>titanic</denchmark-link> dataset saved in MySQL on INSERT predictor error happens. In the column Age, there are missing values for some rows so MindsDB should normalize or add default values for those instead of throwing error.
